title: About Guinsoo's Rageblade.
body:
It needs a buff.

It's become a redundant item.

About the only time it was useful was when I rushed it on Nidalee mid and this was back when Nidalee gained tank stats from her ultimate and I used it to help push waves and take down turrets, her Q's AD ratio was also higher and I could take hybrid pen in masteries so that I had more AD and Magic pen than the masteries now provide and because she was tanky and it provided Spell Vamp and Lifesteal and attack speed it made her Cougar form strong.

I now only buy it rarely, sometimes on Jax if I am fed and even then his AP ratios aren't that great and because Akali was so heavily nerfed and relies more on burst than sustain in most cases, excepting Randuin's Abyssal builds when the game calls for it - it's relatively useless on her and about the only other time I have bought it is on Irelia for lols.

It doesn't provide enough AP to warrant the Spell Vamp and doesn't provide enough AD to warrant the attack speed and lifesteal - or make it useful. Flat AP outdoes it in pretty much all cases.

replies.body:
it is literally the most cost efficient item in the game. Something like 320% gold effficient (and its useless).

I built it recently when I was messing around with a Warwick "on hit" build.
{{item:3091}} {{item:3718}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3071}} 

Rageblade just looks so good on paper and in thoery crafting. Like building it on Jax, Kayle or Eve, but in reality, its a useless item and will just be removed like Atmas and Summoner Revive was. A relic of a time past.
But Atma's was nice because it gave armor plus AD.
and no one built it except maybe a super fed or troll Garen
It was removed more because things like cinderhulk were coming out, Atma's was actually core on most tanks, we just had a lot less tanks then we do now that league of tanks is appearing.

Atmas was a terrible item, don't lie it was not core on any tank and i've been playing this game for many years, the second it got nerfed it became one of the most useless items in the game, why get Atmas when you can get an AD item that provides more and better stats and then go tank? Which is what has been happening for years now, talking about BORK and TF btw, ever since Atmas was nerfed BORK and TF have replaced it.
undo, with that e, you are the new ad carry with many fasts
It was core on Sion because it gave AD based on HP and he had infinite HP gains and massive lifesteal so he could tank and still sustain effectively.

Yasuo built it sometimes when versing against Zed whilst not being fed. 
I think it worked well on Volibear as well.
I forgot that item even existed to be honest.

Actually the item has some good stats its just that other items provide better stats and are more consistent, the problem is there are no champions that will utilize both AP and AD, now you may say champs like Jax and Kayle which is true to a certain extent but it is much better to get an item that focuses on one stat, if i bought an AD item i would most likely get double the stats of what Rageblade's AD stat would give same goes for the AP, in other words why get a little bit of both stats when i can get a lot of one stat? A Jax benefits a lot more from buying BORK, TF and then tank than he would by buying Rageblade.
Just remove it me thinks Cousin.
